title: SENIOR .NET DEVELOPER
description:
Responsibilities:
•	Participating in development projects for clients in EU, US, ANZ, Asia markets.
•	Carrying out assigned tasks to meet all deadlines and delivered with quality results
•	Contributing in designing & implement features to meet customer’s requirements & deadlines
•	Working directly with clients to resolve ambiguities, finalize requirements and ensure technical deliverables meet business expectations
requirements:
•	Good English communication.
•	At least 3 years experience in working with .NET
•	At least 2 years of working experience in web development using .NET technologies
•	Good working knowledge in eCommerce and popular digital CMS systems (Sitecore, EpiServer, Kentico, Umbraco, Sharepoint, DotNetNuke)
•	Good working knowledge in databases (MS SQL Server 2012 R2, 2014; My SQL), stored procedures
•	Experience in Front End skill, such as HTML/ CSS, Javascript, JQuery
•	Own good knowledge in working with Source Control (TFS, SVN), Task management tools (Jira, Basecamp, Redmine, etc.)
•	Strong technical design, analytical and problem-solving skills
•	Initiative and the ability to work independently and in a team
•	Professional and ethic behaviors
•	Creative, active and independent
•	Ability to work in challenging modes
